::Zdorab/Snitch::

The clearing is strewn with burnt palm leaves and chunks of smoldering
mettle, generally surrounding an otherwise cleared blast mark of ash on the
ground. Zdorab steps out from behind some lead shielding and tries to wave
away the smoke from directly in front of him. �I think we used a little too
much power, eh?�

Snitch climbed up on Zdorab�s shoulder. �Hmmmm� not enough power. Base of
target blown up, but shield not penetrated. Never going to be able to
penetrate photon particle field like that.�

Zdorab thought for a second, turning his head from side to side. �No� I don�
t think punching through it is really what we need to go for. I think we
need something long range and that could pass through the field� maybe a
thin stream of negatively charged xenon gas?�

�Too much power you�d need. Energon buffer.�

�Yeah� I see what you mean� and you�d lose a lot in the process too��

The two thought for a long moment. Snitch stroking the hair on his chin, and
Zdorab rubbing his thumb and index finger on his left hand together in a
circular pattern.

�I�ve GOT IT!!!� Zdorab so surprised Snitch that the little monkey fell
clean off Zdorab�s shoulder. �A Transwarp beam! Its powerful enough to be
fired from long distances, and its out of faze with regular space time!�

Snitch started jumping up and down excitedly, clapping his hands. �With
carry on internal particle beam could cut through cull and spread ionic
interference with electrical currents!�

�But,� he made Snitch stop jumping up and down with his sudden seriousness.
�A) it would be extremely detectable. And two��

�B.�

�Yes, B) it would coast an butt load of energy. Depending on range it could
only have three to fourteen shots total before the cell would need to be
replaced.�

�Quantum displacement engine?�

�No� I was thinking more of a� Laser guide. Let it follow a field of
negitive ions to the target. It would take a nano-click more, but one hell
of a lot less energy. One quick blast instead of a continuous stream.�

�Line of sight.�

�Well, yeah, that would restrict the range a little bit, but it�s better
than only being able to use it a couple of times.�

Zdorab and Snitch both shrug, and then go back to work, starting by cleaning
up the clearing before any potential customers arrive.
